title: The DANGEROUS Streets Of Philadelphia: Violence, Drugs & Free Needles in Kensington

media:group.media:title: The DANGEROUS Streets Of Philadelphia: Violence, Drugs & Free Needles in Kensington
media:group.media:description:
I spent 4 days on the streets of Philadelphia to document the drug crisis plaguing this historic city. From being doused with urine, to getting attacked for reporting on Prevention Pointâ€™s needle exchange program, the streets here are no joke. 

For more info on this piece, checkout the article I wrote: https://thepostmillennial.com/savanah-hernandez-reports-dem-backed-needle-exchange-org-helps-addicts-stay-desperate-and-homeless-in-philly
